TextLibrary.Text: No sign of Pirates here. Now fly to Asteroid P4IU987.
No sign of any Pirates here either. Now fly to Asteroid E3CF36J.
Still no sign of any Pirates. Proceed to Asteroid E5GH56P.
Your sensors are detecting an unidentified ship. You may have just found your first Pirate.
Defeat the Pirate at Asteroid E5GH56P.
Well done! Return to Erebus Sigma Station to complete your mission.
